short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension identifies phone numbers and allows the user to click the number to initiate a phonecall.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension identifies phone numbers and allows the user to click the number to initiate a phonecall.

More than that, it also allows any one send SMSs to mobile numbers. It leverages on infobip sms gateway.

We are audacious dream makers and bold transformers.
